title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

altTitles.ja: 白聖女と黒牧師

altTitles.vi: Thánh Nữ Cecilia và Mục Sư Lawrence

description.en:
What’s a priest to do when the Saint he’s tasked to take care of is…a  klutz? One thing’s for sure…every day is bound to be lively!

Saint Cecilia is beloved by the townspeople — not only is she elegant and composed, she benevolently shares her wisdom with all who seek it. That is, until the last person has left — at which point she becomes totally hopeless!

Only Pastor Lawrence is keeping the Saint put together enough to do her duties… and though she may test him, it’s all in a day’s work!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10178/episode/324516) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/2256-saint-cecilia-and-pastor-lawrence-1-4)
description.vi: Thánh nữ Cecilia có một bí mật - đó là cô sống hoàn toàn phụ thuộc vào Lawrence, mục sư của nhà thờ. Ngoài ra cô còn có một tình cảm bí mật đối với Lawrence, nói bí mật cho oai thế thôi chứ ai cũng biết riêng chỉ có Lawrence là không biết thôi

altTitles.ja: 魔法使いをオトす魔法

description.en:
As a witch (male), our protagonist has lived for 168 years and has chosen to remain far away from the humans, living on his own until now. Of course, he has never been in any romantic relationships, but one day, a super handsome golden-haired manager came to his workplace and spontaneously started to court him! How should this gloomy little wizard react?

---

Official English translation on Comico's [Pocket Comics app](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)
description.fr: En tant que sorcier, le protagoniste de notre histoire a vécu pendant 168 ans et a toujours choisi de rester loin des humains, vivant seul jusqu'à présent. Bien sûr, il n'a jamais eu de relation amoureuse, mais un jour, un super beau mec aux cheveux dorés s'est présenté sur son lieu de travail et a commencé à lui faire la cour, à lui ! Comment ce petit sorcier lugubre et solitaire doit-il réagir ?

altTitles.ja: 伝説の男の娘もっこり配信者

description.en:
A femboy shows off his bulge on a livestream!!

However, it gets even more popular than he expected?!

---

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/mukunozaltusou/status/1844651030761685297)
description.id: Seorang cowok cantik mencoba mengolok-olok penonton om-om dengan Steaming sambil cross-dressing dan memamerkan tubuh montoknya!! Namun, tidak disangka dia mendapatkan popularitas karena hal lain...!?
description.ja:
配信でもっこりを見せつける男の娘‼

しかし、それが以外にも人気が出てしまい…⁉

title.en: Gate - Teikoku no Bara Kishidan - Pinya Co Lada 14-sai

altTitles.en: Gate - Piña's Rose Order of Knights
Gate - Rose Knights of the Empire - 14 Year Old Pinya Co Lada

altTitles.ja-ro: Gate - Teikoku no Bara Kishidan - Pinya Co Lada 14-sai

altTitles.ja: ゲート 帝国の薔薇騎士団 ピニャ・コ・ラーダ14歳

altTitles.zh-hk: 門 帝國之薔薇騎士團 平娜‧戈‧蘭達14歲

description.en: A spin-off focusing on Princess Pinya's (from "Gate - Thus the JSDF Fought There!") life before the "Gate" opening to the other world event.

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンの幼なじみ

altTitles.vi: Người Bạn Thuở Nhỏ Trong Hầm Ngục
Bạn thuở nhỏ của tôi là trùm cuối hầm ngục

description.en: At the bottom of an impregnable underground dungeon awaits the final boss, the mighty black dragon Obsidian. The one who dared to challenge Obsidian is Van, an experienced adventurer who has fought many battles with the dragon over the years.
description.ja: 難攻不落の地下ダンジョンの主リューカ。これに挑むは歴戦の剣士ヴァン。両者のプライドを賭けた熱き戦いが今、幕を開ける……。 かと思いきや実は二人は幼なじみで――！？
description.vi: Dungeon x Bạn thuở nhỏ !? Hãy cùng theo dõi họ, trong câu chuyện hài hước lãng mạn ấm áp này nhé! Dưới tầng sâu nhất của một hầm ngục bất khả xâm phạm, kẻ đang chờ đợi là con rồng đen hùng mạnh Obsidian. Người dám thách thức Obsidian là Van, một mạo hiểm gia giàu kinh nghiệm, người đã chiến đấu nhiều trận với con rồng trong nhiều năm qua. Trận chiến giữa hai tâm hồn ngây thơ đáng yêu sắp bắt đầu—!

title.en: Tsukihime: A Piece of Blue Glass Moon - Moon Phase

altTitles.ja: 月姫 -A piece of blue glass moon- ムーンフェイズ

description.en: An anthology featuring characters from Tsukihime: A Piece of Blue Glass Moon.

title.en: The Main Heroines Are Trying to Kill Me

altTitles.ja: 勇者ですが、ヒロインたちに命を狙われています

description.en:
Frey Raon Starlight was the hero who killed his family and comrades and destroyed the world. His goal was to return to the past, unlock a "hidden route" to truly save the world, and achieve peace.

As planned, he successfully returns to the past and gains access to the hidden route. However, his relief is short-lived as he is confronted with an unexpected truth: the five heroines he killed in his previous life have retained their memories and are now trying to kill him...!

Can Frey, under such extreme circumstances, save the world this time?

altTitles.ja: 機動戦史ガンダム武頼

description.en:
A new Gundam war picture scroll, where giant "Tetsuki" scatter the sparks of conflict, is born!

"Sankin Koutai" a large battle tournament where fierce fighters selected from all over the country board giant armored warriors known as Tetsuki to determine the strongest. In order to fulfill his wish, Kotetsu Kisaragi with his "Gundam" Burai, throws himself into the harsh battle...!
description.ja:
巨大な“鉄機”達が火華を散らす、新たなガンダム戦絵巻、爆誕!!

参勤鋼對――それは、全国各地から選ばれた猛者が、巨大な鎧武者・鉄機に乗り込み、最強を決める一大バトルトーナメント。『頑駄無』武頼を駆る如月虎鉄は、己が望みを果たすため過酷な戦へと身を投じるが…！？
description.pt-br: Uma nova história de guerra Gundam  nasce, onde os gigantescos 'Tetsuki' espalham as chamas do conflito. O 'Sankin Koutai', um grande torneio de batalha em que lutadores selecionados em todo o país, embarcam em guerreiros blindados gigantes conhecidos como Tetsuki, para determinar o mais forte. Kotetsu Kisaragi, com seu 'Gundam' Burai, se joga nesta batalha dura para cumprir seu desejo.

title.en: Koharu to Minato: Watashi no Partner wa Onna no Ko

altTitles.ja: 小春と湊 わたしのパートナーは女の子

altTitles.en: Koharu and Minato: My Partner is a Girl

altTitles.th: โคฮารุกับมินาโตะ -แฟนของฉันเป็นผู้หญิง-

description.en:
A sweet essay by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on SNS, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!

Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life...!
description.es-la: El dulce ensayo de una pareja real, que está causando sensación en las redes sociales, comienza a ser serializado en Yuri Hime! Koharu y Minato, una pareja a larga distancia, empiezan a vivir juntas, cumpliendo su sueño. La vida amorosa de estas dos chicas con una diferencia de edad de 10 años, ¿¡será un remedio eficaz para el cansancio diario de la vida moderna...!?
description.pt-br:
Um doce ensaio de um casal da vida real, que atraiu muita atenção no SNS, agora está sendo serializado na Yuri-Hime!

Koharu e Minato são um casal distante que finalmente teve a chance de morar juntos. Seu cotidiano amoroso, mesmo com 10 anos de diferença de idade, vai te curar do cansaço da vida moderna...!

title.en: Doumo, Suki na hito ni Horegusuri wo Iraisareta Majo desu

altTitles.ja: どうも、好きな人に惚れ薬を依頼された魔女です。

altTitles.en: Hello, I Am a Witch, and My Crush Wants Me to Make a Love Potion!
I'm a Witch Whose Crush Requested a Love Potion.

altTitles.zh: 你好、我是受心上人所托来做恋爱药的魔女

altTitles.id: Hai, aku penyihir yang diminta membuat ramuan cinta untuk orang yang kucintai

altTitles.en: Hi, I'm a Witch, and My Crush Wants Me to Make a Love Potion

altTitles.vi: Crush Muốn Tôi Làm Một Lọ Tình Dược Cho Anh Ấy!

description.en:
"I want you to make me a love potion."

The “Witch of the Lake” had her heart broken when the object of her one-sided affection requested that she make him a love potion.

If that’s the case, then I wish to spend more time with him, even if it’s just up until the preparations for the love potion are complete. That was what I had told myself, and yet…

The romantic tale of a reclusive witch and a solemn knight that begins from unrequited love.

---

[Official English Light Novel](http://www.crossinfworld.com/news-articles/New-Release-Hello-I-am-a-Witch-and-my-Crush-Wants-me-to-Make-a-Love-Potion.html)

title.en: "Monban Yattero" to Iware Juugo Nen, Tsuttatetteru Aida ni Ore no Maryoku ga 9999 "Saikyou" ni Sodattemashita

altTitles.ja: 「門番やってろ」と言われ15年、突っ立ってる間に俺の魔力が9999（最強）に育ってました

altTitles.ja-ro: "Monban Yattero" to Iware 15 Nen, Tsuttatetteru Aida ni Ore no Maryoku ga 9999 "Saikyou" ni Sodattemashita

altTitles.en: Being Told "Do Your Best" for 15 Years, My Magical Power Has Grown to 9999 "The Strongest"

description.en:
Although Royle is blessed with a good physique, he was told that he had no talent for fighting, and was forced to work as a lonely gatekeeper for 15 years. While he is working, all he can do is fantasize about the adventure stories in which he is the main character, and his job as gatekeeper is replaced by an “automatic surveillance interception magic tool” and he is laid off.
Loyle is at a loss, but on the way to another town, he meets the saint Diz. After meeting her, he discovers that the “strongest original magic” that he always used in his delusions can in fact be used in reality…
An exhilarating story about the strongest man with no communication skills and 9999 magic power who becomes an adventurer and becomes unrivaled!

altTitles.ja: 大室家

description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

altTitles.en: Till We Meet Again, My King

altTitles.ja: さよならまたね、僕の王1

description.en:
Zhang Li sees his beloved "stone statue" vanish before his eyes. Stricken with grief and remorse, he travels back in time and arrives in Elbis, a mythical ancient civilization that mysteriously perished.  At last, he encounters the "stone statue" again, only to find that he wasn't the old crybaby that clung to him every day, but a cold, ruthless "tyrant" instead. Will he be able to stay with him this time…?

Official Translations:
[Korean](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/my_majesty)
description.uk: Просто на очах Джана Лі мила його серцю кам'яна статуя щезає у небутті. Сповнений горя та каяття, юнак мандрує в минуле та потрапляє до Айбіссу, стародавньої цивілізації, що, за легендами, загадково вгасла багато сторіч тому. Удруге стрівши кам'яну статую, він усвідомлює, що дурник-плаксій, який бігав за ним хвостиком, перетворився на байдужого й безжального “деспота”. Чи здатен він залишитись із ним цього разу?..

title.en: Blue Archive - Problem Solver 68 Business Diary

altTitles.ja: ブルーアーカイブ 便利屋68業務日誌

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive: Nhật kí nghiệp vụ của Handyman 68

description.en: From the smash hit smartphone game "Blue Archive" comes the debut of Problem Solver 68 as our protagonist in this spin-off comic!! Please enjoy the comedic story of our four Problem Solvers in Kivotos - The Academic City!
description.ja: 大人気スマホゲーム『ブルーアーカイブ』から、「便利屋68」を主役としたスピンオフコミックが登場!! 学園都市キヴォトスを舞台に便利屋の4人が巻き起こすドタバタ劇をお楽しみください！
description.vi: Từ trò chơi dành cho smartphone đang nổi tiếng hiện nay "Blue Archive" chào đón sự xuất hiện dưới tư cách nhân vật chính của câu lạc bộ "Handyman 68 (Công ty Dịch vụ giúp việc số 68)" trong bộ manga ngoại truyện này!! Hãy cùng thưởng thức câu chuyện hài hước của bốn cô gái chạy vặt ở Thành phố Học viện Kivotos nào!

description.en: Chapter 17 in Naver's 2023 Rookie Short Story Collection (2023 루키 단편선).

altTitles.ja: 電人アロー

description.en: A young boy named Toshio and his friends, while exploring an abandoned factory, are taken captive by gangsters. Toshi unwittingly discovers a signal device that will summon the cyborg superhero Electric Man Arrow. Arrow comes to the rescue, and, after vanquishing the gangsters' giant robot, entrusts Toshio with the signal device. However, the gangsters' mysterious leader X Fighter learns of this and uses Toshio in his plot to frame Arrow for a string of deadly sabotages. When Arrow finally confronts X Fighter for an explosive showdown, the shadowy link between the two superhumans is finally revealed. In the final chapter of this volume, Arrow faces an entirely different sort of problem, what to do with a gigantic dinosaur that scientists have discovered deep below the earth.

altTitles.ja: フェイト/エクストラ　ＣＣＣ

description.en: The Holy Grail War in the digital world, once again... The protagonist, Hakuno Kishinami, trapped on the dark side of the moon, together with the White Saber in a wedding dress, faces the mystery hidden in the depths of the Sakura labyrinth!

"Filipino Kaisen" takes place in the same universe as "Jujutsu Kaisen" however the story progresses on a different country named "Philippines" and the story follows the music loving "Juno Coralles"

Everything started when "Guanzon Public Highschool" announced a Field trip for the Grade 11 students specifically in Juno's section, However on the day of field trip before Juno departs his home, Juno's Mother gave him an "Anting - Anting" which is a cursed object and without juno knowing about it he wears it as a souvenir from his mother, then when Juno and his classmates in the Field trip bus are about enter their Destination, Several Cursed spirits disturbed their ride and most of the students were wondering why did the bus stopped, however there were two students who can see the Cursed spirits, which are Juno Coralles and Fred Dadansan, and with the help of the "Anting - Anting" Cursed Object, Juno is able to see cursed spirits, efficiently use Cursed energy and Awaken his Cursed Technique, both of them tried to defeat the cursed spirits and succeeded until a bigger threat arrived and two students from the "Luzon Sorcery Highschool" have arrived and starting here the journey of Juno Coralles in the World Of Sorcerery have Begun.

title.en: Tsundere na Watakushi ga Kawaii Nante Shouki Desu ka?

altTitles.ja: ツンデレなわたくしが可愛いなんて正気ですか？

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsundere na Watakushi ga Kawaii Nante Shoki Desuka?

altTitles.en: Are You Serious Thinking a Tsundere Like Me Is Cute?

description.en:
Rose, a prideful and spoiled princess, is known for her arrogance and lack of charm, making her widely disliked. After a life-changing event, she decides to turn her life around and make amends for her past behavior. Her first step? Breaking off her engagement with her kind and supportive fiancé, Rein, to free him from being tied to someone like her.

However, to Rose's surprise, Rein doesn't react as she expects. Instead, he openly declares: "I can't help but find you irresistibly cute." Confused and flustered, Rose struggles to understand his feelings while grappling with her own emotions.

This romantic comedy explores themes of personal growth, self-worth, and unexpected love, all wrapped in the quirky charm of a tsundere protagonist.
description.ja:
わがままで傲慢で可愛げがない――嫌われ者の王女ローズはある出来事をきっかけに改心すると決意した。
手始めに婚約者のレインを自分から解放するため婚約破棄を言い渡す。しかし彼の返事は思いも寄らないもので……？
「生憎私には、あなたが可愛く思えて仕方ないのです」
あなた、正気ですか……！？

altTitles.ja: 苺ましまろ

description.en: "Cute girls doing cute things in cute ways." Everyday things make up the fabric of life, whether it's making friends, going to school, trying to make money, or celebrating a holiday. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the antics and daily lives of Chika Itoh, her sister Nobue, and her friends Miu, Matsuri, and Ana.

altTitles.ja: ユリトラジャンプ～ウルトラジャンプ百合アンソロジー～
Yuritora Janpu ~Urutora Janpu Yuri Ansorojī~
近くて遠い
未織と山神様
友達の友達は友達じゃない

altTitles.ja-ro: Tomodachi no Tomodachi wa Tomodachi janai
Tomodachi no Tomodachi ha Tomodachi janai

altTitles.en: A Friend Of A Friend Is Not A Friend
The Friend of My Friend Is My Enemy

altTitles.ja: だらしない女
ふたつの山向こう側

altTitles.en: On the Other Side of the Two Mountains

altTitles.ja: ドッペルあなた
痩せたいさんと失恋ちゃん

altTitles.en: Wants To Lose Weight–san & Broken Heart–chan

**Volume 1 (2018)**
Cover: Kawai Makoto

1. Chikakute Tooi (近くて遠い) [2C=Galore]

title.en: Kono Ai wo Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.ja: この愛を終わらせてくれないか
Kono Ai o Owarasete kurenai ka

altTitles.zh: 能让这份爱画上休止符吗

description.en: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.

"I shall devour this Jianghu!"

Says a mysterious son of the fruit merchant, holding the Monarch Sword in his left hand, and the Hell Blade on his right.

Possessing not only eloquence but even an overwhelming martial prowess, what could be his ultimate goal?

The delightful journey of the twenty year old youth, ' Jeok Leegeon', who dreams of dominating the martial world, begins!

title.en: Tanbo de Hirotta Onna Kishi, Inaka de Ore no Yome da to Omowareteiru

altTitles.ja: 田んぼで拾った女騎士、田舎で俺の嫁だと思われている

altTitles.en: All My Neighbors are Convinced the Female Knight from My Rice Field is My Wife

altTitles.th: เพราะดันไปเก็บตกอัศวินหญิงจากท้องนา แถวบ้านเลยลือว่านางเป็นภรรยาของผม ตอนที่
เก็บอัศวินหญิงได้จากท้องนา ตอนที่

description.en:
Jin Mita, a farmer living in a small countryside town, discovers an unconscious female knight in his rice field one morning. She calls herself Seraphim, and she seems to have come from another world. She has no knowledge of this world and nowhere to go. Unable to bear seeing her like this, Jin offered to take her in, but apparently the people around him think that Seraphim is his wife...!?

(Source: Magazine Pocket)
description.ja: 小さな田舎町で農家として暮らす三田仁は、ある朝自分の田んぼに女騎士が倒れているのを発見する。セラフィムと名乗る彼女は、どうやら異世界からやって来たらしい。この世界の知識もなく行き場もない。そんな彼女を見かねて一緒に暮らすことを提案するも、どうやら周りからはセラフィムが俺の嫁だと思われてるようで…!? お日様の下の農作業と新鮮素材のお料理。そして美人女騎士と送る、のんびり田舎スローライフ開幕！
description.vi: Một ngày nọ, tôi ra thăm ruộng, thì vô tình gặp một nữ hiệp sĩ đang nằm trong bãi ruộng nhà tôi. Cô ta tự xưng là Seraphim, là kị sĩ tới từ một đế quốc viễn tưởng nào đó. Có vẻ như cô ấy nói thật, vì cô ta không có bất cứ kiến thức gì về thế giới này. Do không thể để mặc cô ấy như vậy, tôi đành đưa cô ấy về nhà chăm sóc. Và do ở vùng quê người ta biết hết dù chỉ là một sự thay đổi nhỏ nhất, người ta bắt đầu đồn cô ấy là vợ tôi...

altTitles.ja: 恥じらう君が見たいんだ

altTitles.en: I Want to See You Embarrassed

altTitles.zh-hk: 想看妳露出羞恥的模樣

altTitles.th: เทคนี้ที่ผมถ่ายเป็นเรื่องน่าอายที่เธอไม่คัท

description.en: Akito Shirasawa, a high school boy whose father is a film director, sees something in the library preparation room. It was the "masturbation scene" of his classmate, Kaho Honjou. Akito is puzzled, but ends up filming it with his smartphone. Kaho notices Akito, and in the men's restroom, makes a "proposal" to Akito! Exposed high school girl and movie boy.
description.ja:
「私の全てを、撮ってほしいの」

映画監督の父を持つ男子高校生・白沢明人はとある放課後に同級生・本上夏帆の自慰行為を目撃してしまう。困惑しながらもついスマホでそれを盗撮する白沢。しかしそれに気づいた本上は、白沢に驚きの提案を持ちかけて…!?
description.es-la: Akito Shirasawa, un chico de secundaria cuyo padre es director de cine, ve algo en la sala de preparación de la biblioteca. Era la "escena de la masturbación" de su compañera de clase, Natsuho Honjo. Akito está desconcertado, pero termina filmándolo con su teléfono inteligente. Natsuho nota a Akito, y en el baño de hombres, ¡le hace una "propuesta" a Akito! Chica de secundaria expuesta y chico de película. ¡Comienza el "amor expuesto" de la retorcida adolescencia!

altTitles.ja: クッキングパパ

description.en:
Araiwa Kazumi is your run-of-the-mill salaryman and father. He’s also secretly an amazing chef! While his coworkers at Kanemaru Industries all eat out for lunch, he pulls out his lunchbox… It’s time for this cooking papa to show off his pro-level cooking skills!

(from Manga Helpers):

Araiwa Kazumi is an energetic salaryman who is able to perfectly manage his responsibilities at work and at home. Kazumi is also a fantastic chef, though many of his coworkers are unaware of it.

His wife Nijiko, who works as a journalist, has a bit of trouble making time for her home life. However, she tries to always be a cheerful mother.

With their son Makoto, who is 7 at the beginning of the story, they have a very happy family. This is a story that follows the Araiwa household and their delight with delicious food. Cooking instructions are also often included throughout the story.

---
- **Won the 39th Kodansha Manga Award Special Prize in 2015**

altTitles.ja: 《魔力無限》のマナポーター ～パーティの魔力を全て供給していたのに、勇者に追放されました。魔力不足で聖剣が使えないと焦っても、メンバー全員が勇者を見限ったのでもう遅い～

description.en:
Thanks to his infinite mana, Ishua has been working as a mana porter to the hero party, doing a perfect task of supplying mana to the party members who consumed a lof of MP and earning the trust of his companions. However, Alan, the hero decides to banish him from the party in a fit of jealousy. 

"We don't need a mana porter!"

And chasing after Ishua through the forest Aria, the saint, appears wishing to continue adventuring with Ishua. The story of the banished strongest mana porter begins here!
description.ja: 生まれ持った無限の魔力で、マナポーターとして勇者パーティ全員の魔力供給を担ってきたイシュア。だが彼は、ある日突然、理不尽な理由でパーティを追放されてしまう。落胆するイシュアのもとに、彼を追ってきたパーティ仲間の聖女アリアの姿が。実は追放は勇者の独断で、彼女はイシュアが自分たちを見捨てたと思い、連れ戻しに来たのだった。真実を知ったアリアはパーティ脱退を決意し、イシュアは彼女と二人で旅を始めることになる。追放された最強マナポーターと、彼を追放した勇者。二人の対照的な冒険が今始まる!!

title.en: Okubyou na Hakushaku Reijou wa Momegoto wo Nozomanai

altTitles.ja: 臆病な伯爵令嬢は揉め事を望まない

altTitles.en: The Timid Count's Daughter Doesn't Want to Fight
The Countess is timid and doesn't want any trouble

description.en:
Amelia is a plain girl who is Sophie's fan and follower. One day, she sees Marion, Sophie's fiance, with Rozetta, another girl.
"I wonder if His Highness will look at me more if I earn Rozetta's ire..."
To prevent Sophie from becoming the antagonist, Amelia begins to coach Sophie in love. However, this attracts the attention of Sophie's tsundere brother?!

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: ナルト
-ナルト-
NARUTO -ナルト-

altTitles.th: นินจาคาถาโอ้โฮเฮะ

description.bg: Тайното село Коноха. Проблемният възпитаник на Нинджа академията Наруто и днес не спира с белите! Огромната мечта на същия този Наруто е да приеме званието на историческия герой Хокаге и да стане нинджа, като надмине всички предишни Хокаге. Ала около раждането на Наруто изглежда витае една тайна...!?
description.cs: Stát se nejlepším nindžou na světě není věc snadná, dokonce ani když nejste obecně zatracovaný outsider, který má v sobě zapečetěného devítiocasého démona, jenž kdysi málem srovnal se zemí celou nindžovskou vesnici. Naruto je však pevně odhodlaný splnit si tento sen a vzdát se za žádných okolností nehodlá. Nejspíš proto, že neví, co to slovo znamená (a prakticky určitě ho nedokáže správně napsat).
description.de: Naruto ist ein berüchtigter Tunichtgut in seinem Dorf, das fast ausschließlich aus Ninja besteht. Er liebt Nudelsuppe und spielt anderen gern Streiche. So ist es kein Wunder, dass er nicht gerade beliebt ist. Doch gerade deshalb will er der beste Ninja seines Dorfes werden. Zu diesem Zweck gehen er und seine Mitschüler Sasuke und Sakura beim großen Meister Kakashi in die Lehre...
description.en:
Before Naruto's birth, a great demon fox had attacked the Hidden Leaf Village. The 4th Hokage from the leaf village sealed the demon inside the newly born Naruto, causing him to unknowingly grow up detested by his fellow villagers. Despite his lack of talent in many areas of ninjutsu, Naruto strives for only one goal: to gain the title of Hokage, the strongest ninja in his village. Desiring the respect he never received, Naruto works toward his dream with fellow friends Sasuke and Sakura and mentor Kakashi as they go through many trials and battles that come with being a ninja.  


---
description.es:
En la Villa Oculta de la Hoja, un chaval de lo más problemático que estudia en la escuela de ninjas, Naruto, se dedica a urdir gamberrada tras gamberrada. El sueño de Naruto es el de llegar un día a heredar el nombre de Hokage, reservado a los grandes héroes, y de convertirse en el mejor ninja de todos los tiempos. ¿¡Podrá Naruto llegar a cumplir sus anhelos de grandeza...!?

---
La aldea escondida entre las hojas está habitada principalmente por ninjas, y entre ellos uno se destaca por sobre todos los demás por ser el más desobediente y quilombero: ¡¡Naruto Uzumaki!! El sueño de Naruto es convertirse en el hokage, el líder de los ninjas, y que todos reconozcan su fuerza; pero el secreto de su verdadero origen puede que sea demasiado difícil de superar.
description.fi:
Konohan ninjakylässä ilman vanhempia varttunut Naruto Uzumaki on ninjakoulun heikoimpia oppilaita. Mutta Narutossa piilee voimia, jotka ylittävät inhimilliset rajat... Naruto on vauhdikas seikkailutarina ninjanuorukaisesta ja hänen ystävistään, taisteluista, toveruudesta ja kunniasta. Sekä kotimaassaan että ulkomailla huippusuosittu sarja pohjautuu taruihin Japanin historian mystisistä ninjasotureista. 

Sarjakuva etenee takakannesta etukanteen ja oikealta vasemmalle. Suositellaan yli 12-vuotiaille.
description.fr: Naruto est un garçon un peu spécial. Il est toujours tout seul et son caractère fougueux ne l'aide pas vraiment à se faire apprécier dans son village. Malgré cela, il garde au fond de lui une ambition: celle de devenir un maître Hokage, la plus haute distinction dans l'ordre des ninjas, et ainsi obtenir la reconnaissance de ses pairs.
description.id: Ini adalah Desa Konohagakure... Naruto adalah salah satu murid di Akademi Ninja yang suka berbuat onar!! Impian Naruto adalah menjadi seorang Hokage. Tetapi, Naruto memiliki rahasia sejak lahir karena di dalam tubuhnya terdapat siluman rubah yang disegel! Inilah petualangan Naruto untuk mewujudkan impiannya...
description.it:
"Naruto" è incentrato sulle avventure di un ragazzino, Uzumaki Naruto, che vuole diventare un famoso ninja e lasciare un segno nella storia. Gli ostacoli sul suo cammino sono però molti, come le prove che dovrà sostenere e i rivali che dovrà affrontare...

---
Naruto Uzumaki è un ragazzo dodicenne del Villaggio della Foglia che insegue il sogno di diventare Hokage, cioè il ninja più forte, nonché capo del villaggio. Il giovane custodisce in sé un segreto di cui lui stesso è all'oscuro: all'interno del suo corpo è sigillato un demone, conosciuto come Volpe a Nove Code, che attaccò il villaggio dodici anni prima e fu sigillato dal Quarto Hokage in cambio della vita. Per questo motivo, Naruto è stato sempre associato allo spirito demoniaco ed è cresciuto isolato da tutti. Dopo l'ennesima bocciatura di Naruto all'esame dell'accademia per il diploma di Genin, il suo maestro Iruka Umino lo salva dal maestro traditore Mizuki che lo aveva spinto a rubare un rotolo contenente delle tecniche proibite. In questo frangente, Naruto scopre finalmente il suo segreto. Questo, unito al desiderio di salvare Iruka, gli dà la spinta necessaria a sconfiggere Mizuki con la Tecnica Superiore della Moltiplicazione del Corpo, appresa dal rotolo. Grazie a questa dimostrazione di coraggio, il ragazzo riesce a guadagnarsi la promozione a Genin ed entra a far parte della Squadra 7 insieme a Sakura Haruno e Sasuke Uchiha, sotto la guida del maestro Kakashi Hatake.
description.ja: ここは木ノ葉隠れの里。忍術学校の問題児、ナルトは今日もイタズラ三昧！！　そんなナルトのでっかい夢は歴代の勇者、火影の名を受けついで、先代を越える忍者になることだ。だがナルトには出生の秘密が…！？
description.pl: Osada Konoha-gakure. Naruto, uczeń szkoły dla ninja, rozrabia jak tylko potrafi! Mimo to, jego marzeniem jest pokonanie "Hokage", czyli aktualnego przywódcy wojowników. Gdy Naruto się rodził, wydarzyło się coś, o czym on sam wciąż jeszcze nie wie...
description.pt: La aldea escondida entre las hojas está habitada principalmente por ninjas, y entre ellos uno se destaca por sobre todos los demás por ser el más desobediente y quilombero: ¡¡Naruto Uzumaki!! El sueño de Naruto es convertirse en el hokage, el líder de los ninjas, y que todos reconozcan su fuerza; pero el secreto de su verdadero origen puede que sea demasiado difícil de superar.
description.ru: Двенадцать лет назад, мощный Девятихвостый Демон-Лис напал на деревню ниндзя, Коноху. Демон был быстро побежден и запечатан в младенце по имени Наруто Узумаки. Но для этого, главному ниндзя Конохи, четвёртому хокаге пришлось пожертвовать жизнью… Теперь, по прошествии 12-и лет, Наруто является номером один среди придурков ниндзя, который полон решимости стать следующим Хокаге и получить признание всех, кто когда-либо сомневался в нем!
description.sr: Jedan od najpopularnijih naslova širom sveta sada je konačno dostupan i domaćim čitaocima. Serijal prati avanture dečaka Naruta, koji pokušava da postane veliki ratnik i nadmaši sve prethodnike. Ali moraće najpre da se bori sa samim sobom.
description.tr:
Naruto, ünlü mangaka Masaşi Kişimoto tarafından yaratılan, 1999 yılından beri Japonya’da yayınlanan dünyaca ünlü manga serisi artık Türkiye’de.

Bugüne kadar Japonya’da 100 milyondan fazla satan Naruto serisi, 2002 yılında bu başarısı taçlandırarak animeye uyarlandı. Ülkemizde de gösterilen bu anime, manga kültürünü dünyaya tanıtıp; Naruto’yu dünyadaki en önemli mangalardan biri haline getirdi. Yıllardan beri geniş bir hayran kitlesi tarafından Türkçe’de yayınlanması beklenen bu eser, manganın özünden hiçbir şey kaybetmemesine özen gösterilerek ve Japonya’da olduğu gibi sağdan sola okunacak biçimde hazırlandı. Yediden yetmişe herkese hitap eden Naruto, çizgi roman kültürü ile ilgili olmayanların bile severek okuyabileceği bir eser.
description.uk: Дванадцять років тому, потужний Дев'ятихвостий Демон-Лис напав на селище Коноху. Демон був швидко переможений і запечатаний в дитинку на ім'я Наруто Узумакі. Але для цього, головному ніндзя Конохи, четвертому хокаге довелося пожертвувати життям... Тепер, після 12-и років, Наруто є номером один серед ніндзя, який сповнений рішучості стати наступним Хокаґе та отримати визнання всіх, хто коли-небудь сумнівався в ньому!

description.en: The stunning financial reporter, Zheng Shuyi, is dating a two-timing scumbag? How could she possibly stand back and do nothing about those love birds: the cheating bastard and his white lotus of a mistress. Upon seeing the Rolls-Royce's plate number of the mistress' uncle, which was a straight numerical number plate, Zheng Shuyi made up her mind. Doesn't the cheater plan to marry rich to retire twenty years early, by going down the laughable CEO route? Then I shall become both you and your mistress' aunt!

altTitles.th: โฮริมิยะ สาวมั่นกับนายมืดมน

altTitles.ja: ホリミヤ

description.en:
Kyoko Hori is your average teenage girl… who has a side she wants no one else to ever discover. Then there's her classmate Izumi Miyamura, your average glasses-wearing boy — who's also a totally different person outside of school. When the two unexpectedly meet, they discover each other's secrets, and a friendship is born.

Read the official English release on [MangaUp](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/122).
description.es: Kyōko es una alumna modélica y popular que al llegar a casa se convierte en una chica hogareña muy discreta. Miyamura, su compañero de clase, es un tipo del montón con cierto aire de friki que en sus ratos libres se transforma en un chico muy atractivo con piercings y mucho estilo. ¿Qué ocurriría si Izumi y Kyōko descubrieran la cara oculta el uno del otro?
description.fr:
D'un côté, il y a Hori, la lycéenne à la mode et populaire à première vue, mais qui est en fait une fille très simple et qui pense avant tout à sa famille. Et de l'autre, il y a Miyamura, le lycéen réservé qui se cache derrière ses lunettes, mais qui est en réalité un garçon chaleureux et aux nombreux piercings. Que se passe-t-il quand les deux se rencontrent par hasard sous leur véritable jour ?

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Nobi Nobi**
description.ru: Хори пытается казаться обычной старшеклассницей, тогда как на самом деле уделяет все свое время уходу за домом. Из-за постоянного отсутствия родителей-трудоголиков девушке приходится заменять младшему брату семью, заниматься уборкой, стиркой и прочими домашними делами. Однажды она встречает человека, который, так же как и она, старается не открывать свою настоящую сторону личности в школе: Миямура - молчаливый парень в очках. Теперь им двоим есть с кем поделиться и раскрыть настоящих себя, не боясь, что об этом узнают в школе.
description.tr:
Kyoko Hori sıradan... ve kimsenin keşfetmemesini istediği bir tarafı olan liseli bir kız. Ve tabii bir de sınıf arkadaşı olan Izumi Miyamura var, sınıfın klasik gözlüklü çocuğu — ve okul dışında kesinlikle bambaşka birisine dönüşüyor.

İkisi bir rastlantıyla tanıştıklarında, birbirlerinin sırlarını öğreniyorlar, ve bir arkadaşlık ilişkisi kuruluyor.
description.pt-br: O doce e levemente ácido gostinho da juventude!! De um lado, Hori-san, que à primeira vista faz o tipo patricinha, mas na verdade é uma garota simples e prendada. Do outro, Miyamura-kun, que na escola emana um ar negativo com seus óculos e aparência sem graça, quando na verdade é um gato cheio de piercings. O que acontece quando o acaso faz com que esses dois, que parecem ser tão diferentes, mas têm tanto em comum, se encontrem.?!

altTitles.en: Don't Mess With the Film Club!

altTitles.ja: 映像研には手を出すな！

altTitles.ja-ro: Eizouken ni wa Te o Dasu na!
Eizouken ni ha Te wo Dasu na!

description.en:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!
___
**Additional Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Anime Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)
- [Official Anime Website](http://eizouken-anime.com/)
- [Official Live-Action Website](https://eizouken-saikyo.com/)

title.en: Miss Wolf and Her Fox Sister

altTitles.zh: 狼小姐和她的狐狸妹妹

altTitles.zh-ro: Lang Xiaojie He Ta De Huli Meimei

description.en: [Savage Wolf X Cunning Fox] In the modern therianthrope world, everyone respects the law of the jungle where the strong prey on the weak. Twenty-year-old Yu Wenxi, as a gray wolf therianthrope, stands at the top of the food chain. She has made a name for herself with her fists. She is violent and volatile, always looking down on the weak. Until one day, when her stepsister left a fox cub with her. From then on, the wild wolf turned into a good big dog. She vowed to raise the crybaby cub, train it into a model student, and give it the best that life has to offer. However, the little fox is hiding a wicked heart under the guise of a good girl...

title.en: Isekai Kaeri no Yuusha wa, Dungeon ga Shutsugen shita Genjitsu Sekai de, Influencer natte Kane wo Kasegimasu!

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りの勇者は、ダンジョンが出現した現実世界で、インフルエンサーになって金を稼ぎます！

altTitles.en: The Hero Returns from Another World, Becomes an Influencer, and Earns Money in the Real World, Where Dungeons have Appeared!

description.en: One day, an ordinary high school student is transferred to another world. He raises his level in the other world, successfully defeats the Demon King, and saves the world! With his strongest status, he decided to return to his own world; however, in the world to which he returns, a new "dungeon" has appeared.
description.ja: ある日異世界へ召喚された普通の高校生が、着実にモンスターを倒しレベルを上げ、無事魔王を倒し、世界を救うことに成功！　その最強ステータスのまま現実社会に帰還することに――！？
description.es-la: Un día, un estudiante de secundaria normal y corriente es llevado a otro mundo. Sube su nivel en el otro mundo, derrota con éxito al Rey Demonio y salva el mundo. Con su nivel más fuerte, decide volver a su mundo. Sin embargo, en el mundo al que regresa, ha aparecido también una nueva "mazmorra". Una moderna fantasía de mazmorras en la que el antiguo héroe se convierte en un guerrero, ¡que se adentra en las mazmorras creadas en su propio mundo!

description.en: What happens when two yandere stalkers fall in love with each other?
description.pl:
Co się stanie, gdy zakocha się w sobie dwóch stalker'ów yandere?  
  
Italian/Italiano: ||Tradotto da [Isekai Italy Scan](https://mangadex.org/group/12027/isekai-italy-scan)  
  
Cosa succederà quando due yandere si innamoreranno l'un l'altro?||
description.pt-br: O que acontece quando dois Stalkers yandere se apaixonam?

title.en: Rikei ga Koi ni Ochita no de Shoumei shitemita

altTitles.ja: 理系が恋に落ちたので証明してみた。
リケ恋

altTitles.ja-ro: Rikei ga Koi ni Ochita no de Shoumei Shite Mita

altTitles.en: Science Fell in Love, so I Tried to Prove It
I Tried to Prove That Science Fell in Love
Science Has Fallen in Love, so We Tried to Prove It

altTitles.fr: J'ai essayé de prouver que la science était tombée amoureuse

altTitles.ru: Наука влюблена и мы докажем это
Учёные влюблены и намерены доказать это научно
Я пытался доказать, что наука влюбилась

altTitles.th: พิสูจน์นิยามความรักด้วยหลักวิชาสายวิทย์

altTitles.zh: 理科生坠入情网，故尝试证明。
试证明理科生已坠入情网。

altTitles.zh-hk: 理科生墜入情網，故嘗試證明。
試證明理科生已墜入情網。

description.en: Yukimura Shinya and Himuro Ayame are two scientists that want to find out if love can be solved by a scientific theory. These two scientists also have feelings for each other and want to be able to solve their true feelings through similar theoretical facts. With this perfect opportunity, these scientists will attempt to solve the theory of the love they express for each other.
description.ru: Химуро Аямэ и Юкимура Шинья ну просто обожают точные науки. Им надо, чтобы всё имело научное обоснование, ведь без этого нельзя быть уверенным ни в чём. Ох уж эти ученые, какие только эксперименты не придут в эти головы, чтобы доказать "любовь".

description.en:
'Sejong's secret weapon, Shadow Unit informer.'
Gwiyoung, called the Ghost's Shadow, has been wandering around the battlefield since childhood.
Vowing to get revenge, he decided to become a member of the nation's best special forces as an informer.

title.en: Tensei Shitara Sainou ga Atta Ken ~Isekai Itte mo Doryoku Suru~

altTitles.ja: 転生したら才能があった件～異世界行っても努力する～

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated With Talent: I'll Work Hard Even If I Go to Another World

description.en:
In a twist of fate, a diligent ronin student finds himself transported to an unfamiliar realm. This unexpected journey began when he valiantly attempted to stop a robbery alongside a female store clerk. Longing for a unique ability that he could hone through hard work, he sought the blessings of a deity. Consequently, he was endowed with two rare talents: "Innate Talent," allowing him to consistently surpass others, and "Clairvoyance," which grants him the insight to assess both individuals and objects. Yet, there's a catch; he requires thrice the standard experience to ascend in levels.

Reborn as Mars, the second son of a noble viscount lineage, he remains committed to refining his abilities. However, the town's periphery shows alarming indications of an imminent monster incursion. Thus, Mars' extraordinary journey of reincarnation in this fantastical world commences.
description.ja: いくら努力しても報われない浪人生は、コンビニの女性店員とともに強盗を捕縛しようとした瞬間、異世界に転生することになってしまった。神様に“努力をしたらしただけ恵まれる才能”を望むんだところ、レベルアップに人より3倍の経験値が必要だが、確実に人より成長できる【天賦】と他者や物を鑑定できる【天眼】のスキルをもらうことになった。準男爵家の次男・マルスとして転生し、努力を重ねてステータスを伸ばしていたが、街の近くで魔物が溢れるスタンピードの前兆が見られて……。異世界転生努力ファンタジー、ここに開幕！

altTitles.ja: 異世界のんびり農家

altTitles.fr: La vie de fermier dans un autre monde

altTitles.pt-br: A Vida Agrícola em Outro Mundo

altTitles.vi: Cuộc Sống Nông Dân Ở Thế Giới Khác

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.ja:
闘病の末に命を落とした青年・火楽は、神様によって蘇生され、若返って異世界に転移した。第二の人生を楽しむため、授けられた『万能農具』を手に、異世界で掘って伐って耕して…。

**Links:**  

- [![](https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png) Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3289ds/)
- [Official LN (JP)](http://www.fujimishobo.co.jp/sp/201803nonbiri/)
- [Alternative Raw](https://dragonage-comic.com/product/nonbiri_noka/)
description.tr: Henüz 39 yaşındayken hastalıktan ölen Machio Hiraku'ya başka bir dünyaya gitme fırsatı verilir. Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.

description.en: The extraordinary Princess Parfait's marvelous fantasy adventure!
Do you have any "fangs"――?

altTitles.ja: ケイ

description.en:
K is the name of a mysterious mountaineer who routinely exposes himself to mortal danger in order to complete miraculous one-man mountain search and rescue missions for lost expeditions. Although he conquers the world’s tallest mountains, he himself is of unknown origin—hearsay has it that he is of Japanese descendance.
His extraordinary skillset as a rock and ice climber have singlehandedly turned him not only into a legend among local tribes of the Himalaya mountain range but also a highly sought-after lifesaver—even when it comes to the most desperate of situations where other ascensionists have already given up all hope. Regardless, K is not in it for the money. He perceives of mountains as both an opportunity for personal growth and a way of strengthening his bond with mother nature herself, utilizing the lessons learned from regional mountain folk and by observing animal behaviour to solve the increasingly more difficult challenges thrown at him by the eight-thousanders.
Equipped with this adventure-packed drama as your mountain guide, your spirit shall be elevated to the height of manga—and beyond.

title.en: The Bugle Call: Song of War

altTitles.ja: 戦奏教室

description.en:
In Arboral Year 1294, the world is dominated by nine massive towers known as the Spires, remnants of an ancient civilization. Filled with lost secrets and powerful knowledge, nations struggle to possess them. Luca is a bugler in a mercenary company who wants nothing more than to leave the battlefield behind and become a true musician, a maestro. But marked as one of the enigmatic Branch-hexed, and gifted with the strange ability to see the sound of his instrument, Luca finds himself drawn reluctantly into a war of epic proportions!

Left for dead after a battle, Luca is saved by the mysterious Pontiff and learns he is not the only person with unusual powers. The Pontiff has formed a special team of Branch-hexed individuals he plans to use to help him defeat rival empires, and Luca learns that his powers, rather than being an escape from the battlefield, now force him to be a muse of massacre.
description.fr:
Transcender le fracas des armes, décider du sort de la bataille !
Luka, orphelin recueilli par le chef d'un groupe de mercenaires, n'est pas comme les autres : une branche pousse sur son crâne et il peut voir les sons, matérialisés par des traits de lumière... Le seul à lui parler sans crainte est son père adoptif, aussi fin stratège qu'impitoyable au combat. À 14 ans, Luka a déjà vu assez d'horreurs pour une vie. En tant que clairon, il est de tous les affrontements, transmettant les ordres via son instrument. En réalité, il n'a qu'une envie : échapper à ce quotidien fait de violence pour devenir musicien...


Seulement, la bataille qui s'annonce pourrait être sa dernière : cette fois, il doit prendre les armes... et, surtout, parmi ses opposants se trouvent d'autres "branchus' dotés de divers pouvoirs surnaturels ! Ils font un massacre dans les rangs de Luka, et ce dernier, blessé, se saisit d'un clairon pour sonner la retraite... C'est alors que son véritable pouvoir se dévoile : tous ses alliés visualisent le son de son instrument et ses indications résonnent comme des ordres dans la tête des soldats de son camp ! Le garçon les sauve grâce aux stratégies de son père adoptif.


Témoins de son exploit, les énigmatiques adversaires s'emparent de lui. Luka s'éveille dans une ville entourant une tour immense, vestige des temps anciens et source de magie... Ses nouveaux compagnons sont les protecteurs du lieu, régi par un mystérieux pape. Celui-ci passe un accord avec Luka : si le garçon met son pouvoir et son don tactique à son service, il l'aidera à devenir musicien. Sans le savoir, le jeune prodige se retrouve embarqué dans une guerre dont les enjeux le dépassent !


La lumière du son, seul espoir dans l'horreur des batailles... D'un trait vif et nerveux, une nouvelle génération d'auteurs invente un monde de dark fantasy sans concession. Mais ici, pas de héros surdoué au combat, juste un garçon rêvant de musique... Et pourtant, de ses talents dépend l'issue du conflit !

description.en:
Hana was never first. Always because Han Geon Woo came in first every time!
Hana would do anything to best Geon Woo, even though she can't figure him out.
This time, she tried to shock him by confessing...
He believed and accepted the confession though? 
Does he like me?

altTitles.ja: 乱破～ヤンキー忍風帖～

description.en: Kazama Endo is the ultimate delinquent, unbeaten in a fight. He goes to scope out a boy who beat up his henchmen, but it turns out this boy is anything but ordinary!

altTitles.ja: リィンカーネーションの花弁

description.en: Striving for talent, Senji Touya tries everything he can so he can find it. Kendou, dancing, swimming, basketball, soccer, chess… anything he tries, he fails to exceed it. One day, his classmate, Haito, came to school for once in a long time. Senji refers to her as someone who "has it" or someone who has talent. Later on, he found out that she isn't just someone who has talent, but someone who "took" the talent of herself in her past life. And, those who "took" the talent from their past lives, are also known as "Returners"…
description.vi: Cố gắng tìm kiếm tài năng, Senji Touya thử mọi thứ có thể để tìm ra nó. Kiếm đạo, nhảy múa, bơi lội, bóng rổ, bóng đá, cờ vua… bất cứ thứ gì cậu thử, cậu đều không thể vượt trội. Một ngày nọ, cô bạn cùng lớp của cậu, Haito, tới trường sau một thời gian dài vắng mặt. Senji coi cô là người "có nó" – một người có tài năng. Sau đó, cậu phát hiện ra rằng cô không chỉ là một người có tài năng mà còn là người đã "lấy" tài năng của mình từ kiếp trước. Và, những người "lấy" tài năng từ kiếp trước của họ còn được gọi là "Những Kẻ Trở Lại"…
description.pt-br: Na busca por um talento só seu, Senji Touya tenta de tudo para encontrá-lo. Kendou, dança, natação, basquete, futebol, xadrez… em tudo o que ele tenta, ele não consegue se destacar. Um dia, sua colega de classe, Haito, vem à escola pela primeira vez em muito tempo. Senji se refere a ela como alguém que “possui algo” ou alguém que tem um verdadeiro talento. Mais tarde, ele descobriu que ela não é apenas alguém que tem talento, mas alguém que “conseguiu” o talento de si mesma através de sua vida passada. E, aqueles que “conseguem” o talento de suas vidas passadas, também são conhecidos como “Reencarnados” …

altTitles.ja: ふつうの軽音部

altTitles.fr: La fille qui découvre le rock !

description.en: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!
description.es-la: Chihiro Hatono, estudiante de primer año de preparatoria y apasionada por el rock japonés se adentra en el mundo del club de música ligera con una nueva guitarra a cuestas. Pero, ¿qué le espera tras esas puertas...? ¡Un drama sobre juventud sin filtros y ambición musical toma el escenario!
description.pt-br: Com uma paixão pelo rock japonês ricamente texturizado, a estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio Chihiro Hatono entra no mundo do clube de música leve, com uma nova guitarra em mãos. Mas o que a espera atrás daquelas portas...? Um drama de juventude não filtrada e ambição musical sobe ao palco!

title.en: Wakeari Senpai no Kanojo ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 訳アリ先輩の彼女になりました

description.en:
"Ah, I want to die."   
  
Sagami, who works part time at a convenience store, is a target of bullying - one of the reasons is her grades being not the best. Meanwhile, Onizuka, an ex-studious turned delinquent, gets tangled with her. With their fates now intertwined, how will they grow out of their pasts?
